headline: CHMP Issues Positive Opinion for Label Expansion of BMY's Opdivo
summary: BMY obtains CHMP recommendation for Opdivo for perioperative regimen of neoadjuvant Opdivo and chemotherapy followed by surgery and adjuvant Opdivo for resectable non-small cell lung cancer.

headline: Beat the S&P 500 With This Cash-Gushing Dividend Stock
summary: Investors seeking relief from stock market volatility should take a closer look at Bristol Myers Squibb (NYSE: BMY).  At the time of writing, shares of the healthcare giant have climbed 4% year to date -- a notable outlier amid the broader stock market sell-off, with the S&P 500 index currently down nearly 10% from its peak.  Here's why this cash-generating biopharmaceutical leader is poised to continue outperforming the S&P 500.
